post.body: it's some new show called Castles. license plates on the cop cars they're using in front of the house say NY. another CSI ripoff?
BOO! WAR Lakers!
might be a bad batch, maybe Gale at Kodak can give you a refund...
i'm hella proud in our grain. bah to all those HD/24p 35mm adaptor coolkids who think they're so awesome! emulsion rocks baby!
btw, they did rig those 9-light molpars on to a scissors lift. that Shirley is how moonlight is made...or not?
wheels out bitches!!!
wonder if my walkie and headset will get me on set down the block and access to their crafty?
after i got my cams up, went down the street to take a peek...looks like they're on sweet, sweet 35!
wow, things just got sillier. two 5-ton trucks just pulled up.
so it's a new show. cool to see big lights. couple of 10k's soldiered and it looks like they're gonna rig some 9-light molpars to a lift
update: whoa! a 10-ton truck just pulled in. wonder if it's a feature?
slight miscalculation. good: beat traffic, bad: call time an hour away. other news: another shoot down the street that is 20x humongerer.
Eagle Eye was what i expected; not dope.
Hark! I have found a new deity and her name is: Trader Joe's Baked Cheese Crunchies. She brings happiness and life. Also less cheese dust.
Danny Boyle is Genius. when i go out, i want to be in a bathtub filled with skrill too.
Day 10 thru 15 of Chocolate Advent Calendar: Icicles or Candy Cane w/out the hook, Mushroom, Star, Lantern, Moon, and Wreath
Day 8 & 9 of Chocolate Advent Calendar: Drum and Ornament
Day 5,6, & 7 of Chocolate Advent Calendar: Four Leaf Clover, Gift Box, and Cottage
ate too much, may fall asleep on camera...but it'll match; it's reality tv.
maybe I should be nice and help the makeup girl unload since we're first here...NAW.
Day 3 & 4 of Chocolate Advent Calendar: Jingle Bell and Gift Box, respectively
damn, Phife you got fat! Yeah, i know it looks pathetic, Ali Shaheed Muhammad got me doing calisthenics
a grand balmy day in the City at cousin Lei's place.
flew today and lived. channel 4 news camera may have filmed us in line checking in...
since i'll be out of town...Day 23 and 24 of Chocolate Advent Calendar: Christmas Tree and Santa Clause
Day 16 thru 22 of Chocolate Advent Calendar: Teddy Bear, Heart, Squirrel, Rudolph, Snowman, Candle, and Angel
